bioconda.name: kat
bioconda.summary: KAT is a suite of tools that analyse jellyfish hashes or sequence files (fasta or fastq) using kmer counts.

biocontainers.name: kat
biocontainers.summary: KAT is a suite of tools that analyse jellyfish hashes or sequence files (fasta or fastq) using kmer counts

biotools.summary: Suite of tools that generate, analyse and compare k-mer spectra produced from sequence files

bioschemas.name: KAT
bioschemas.summary: Suite of tools that generate, analyse and compare k-mer spectra produced from sequence files
